news_header: Stora Enso, Kone, and Telia report improved quality despite a drop in comparable operating margins in Q3. Stora Enso's net sales rose, Kone's sales slightly increased, and Telia's sales showed a modest decline.
news_text: Stora Enso, Kone, and Telia have reported improvements in quality, although their comparable operating margins fell in the third quarter. Stora Enso's net sales increased by 6% year-on-year to approximately EUR 2.3 billion, with an adjusted operating result of EUR 175 million, significantly higher than the previous year's EUR 21 million. Kone's net sales rose by 0.1% to around EUR 2.8 billion, with an adjusted operating profit of approximately EUR 319 million and a 4.4% increase in orders. Telia's comparable net sales decreased by 0.9% to about EUR 21.7 billion, but its adjusted operating margin grew by 1.7%. Meanwhile, Neste's comparable operating margin fell sharply to EUR 293 million from EUR 1,047 million a year ago, attributed to weak market conditions.
